programme.desc: Duas mulheres, uma negra e uma branca, em 1955 Montgomery Alabama, devem decidir o que faro em resposta ao famoso boicote aos nibus liderado por Martin Luther King.

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: Crimes de Rua, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Dois policiais, um com uma arma e outro com os punhos, arriscam tudo para tornar o bairro livre de crimes e drogas, derrubando o mais poderoso chefo das ruas

programme.title: Famlia de Policiais II: Uma Quebra de Confiana, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: O inspetor Paul Fein volta sua antiga vizinhana para desvendar um crime: a mfia russa suspeita de ter assassinado um padre. Desta vez, ele precisa enfrentar fantasmas do passado, sob o risco de ter a sua famlia na mira dos bandidos.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson um policial escolhido pelo governo dos Estados Unidos para cuidar de uma misso mortal na qual deve viajar meio mundo para capturar uma bela amante de um Czar submundo do crime.

programme.title: Malcolm X, (1993, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: O lder afro-americano Malcolm X tem o pai assassinado pela Klu Klux Klan e sua me internada por insanidade. Preso aos 20 anos de idade, Malcolm se converte ao islamismo e passa a pregar seus ideais.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: No fim do sculo 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violncia crescendo, at tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: Conspirao Fatal, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de ser preso e ter sua reputao na Fora Area manchada, um piloto veterano foge da cadeia e parte em busca do verdadeiro criminoso. Ele, ento, descobre uma conspirao terrorista em andamento e somente ele poder evitar um desastre.

programme.title: Carta Para Deus, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Um menino que luta contra o cncer escreve cartas para Deus, tocando vidas em sua vizinhana e inspirando esperana entre todos com quem entra em contato.

programme.title: A Guerra de Anna, (2019, War Drama)
programme.desc: Uma menina de seis anos chamada Anna tem toda a famlia assassinada em uma execuo em massa de judeus. Por um milagre, ela sobrevive e passa as prximas centenas de dias escondida na chamin em desuso de um comandante nazista.

programme.title: The Music of Silence, (2018, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme biogrfico sobre o tenor e msico italiano Andrea Bocelli. Apesar de ter nascido com um grave problema de viso que terminar em cegueira, Bocelli supera todos os tipos de obstculos, guiado por grandes ambies em relao sua paixo, a msica.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Abrao, (1993, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Deus decide fazer uma nova promessa humanidade depois das calamidades que culminaram no desastre da Torre de Babel. Abrao escolhido para torna-se o Pai das Naes e a histria da redeno se inicia.

programme.title: O Milagre, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Um novo professor enviado para trabalhar numa pequena vila que sequer possui uma escola. L, ele logo faz amizade com um simptico homem deficiente. O professor rene os moradores para construir uma escola ali para ensinar as crianas e seu novo amigo.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Henry Altmann, zangado como sempre, acorda com uma dor de cabea terrvel. Uma nova mdica, Sharon Gill, ir v-lo. Quando Sharon conhece Henry, ele a repreende at que, exasperada, ela diz a ele que provavelmente ele tem apenas 90 minutos de vida.

programme.title: O Mdico, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: No sculo XI, um rfo carente viaja para a Prsia para estudar medicina com um renomado curandeiro.

programme.title: Jaspion e Kanoko sonham com sete raios de luz que atingem cinco crianas, um heri e um beb. Edin vem Terra ajuda-los a interpretar o sonho.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Edin leva a famlia Nanbara para o seu mundo, um porto seguro contra os ataques de Satan Goss. Enquanto isso, Kilza e Macgaren executam seu prximo plano.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: O cozinheiro espacial Bragul e Macgaren se unem para raptar Miya e atrair Jaspion para uma emboscada.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Miki uma menina com poderes sobrenaturais. Resgatada por Macgaren de um desmoronamento ela pressionada a ajud-lo. Macgaren usa o poder de Miki para corromper os cidados da vila.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A irm da bruxa Kilza, Kilmaza, surge com os ninjas espaciais e pe em prtica seu plano de fazer as pessoas odiarem Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Kilmaza implanta diamantes falsos na terra para corromper o corao das pessoas e trazer caos ao pas
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: John Tiger um ex-assassino profissional e amigo de infncia de Jaspion. Abandonou o caminho do crime com muito tempo e cuida de um orfanato, mas Kilmaza surge para enfeiti-lo. Jaspion ter que enfrent-lo em um duelo mortal para quebrar o feitio.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Durante uma viagem espacial, os cientistas do planeta Brain Dr. Pab, Dra. Mam e seu filho Pep so raptados pelo Sindicato da Treva Galctica ao mando de Kilmaza.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: A histria de Pep e Hiroshi

programme.title: Satan Goss comea sua metarmorfose. uma transformao dolorosa que provoca nele acessos de fria incontrolvel. Para acalm-lo, Kilmaza e Macgaren procuram sacrificar uma menina em um ritual maligno.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: O misterioso mundo de Satan Goss

programme.title: Aps a metamorfose Satan Goss exerce seu grande poder alterando a superfcie da Terra e transformando-a numa floresta de monstros gigantes.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A sede de destruio de Satan Goss no tem tamanho. Macgaren treina com seu pai para derrotar Jaspion. Kilmaza continua executando seus planos malignos. Jaspion precisa encontrar logo na quinta criao.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: Sou o filho de Satan Goss!

programme.title: Comea a ltima batalha onde Jaspion e Edin enfrentam Satan Goss e Kilmaza.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: A unio dos povos da Via Lctea

programme.title: O grande profeta Edin previu a apario do maligno deus das trevas Satan Goss. Edin convocou Jaspion para defender o Universo e derrotar Satan Goss.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Daileon faz um pouso forado no planeta Peace. L, Jaspion conhece o satlite artificial Sakura que controla o planeta e seus habitantes bestiais.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Jaspion se depara com o monstro Namaguederaz, um monstro pacfico que foi atingido por uma flecha venenosa. O menino Koko, que convive com o monstro, revela que s a fruta da vida pode salv-lo.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Edin acha que a Terra, por ter sido antigamente habitada por vrios monstros, seria um alvo em potencial de Satan Goss.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A jovem Satomi, em sua escola, teve vises de um monstro. Por causa disso, ela se assusta e chama a ateno da aula toda.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Crianas de uma vila local encontram um filhote de monstro. MacGaren e sua quadrilha, disfarados, levam o monstrinho. Jaspion ajuda as crianas a recuperarem o filhote, mas MacGaren contra ataca.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Quatro jovens desaparecem misteriosamente numa trilha pelas montanhas. Anri encontra Jaspion e explica sobre os misteriosos desaparecimentos no "Monte Uivante".
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Boomerman pede ajuda para Jaspion e avisa que dois membros da quadrilha de MacGaren desertaram, e por isso so perseguidos sob pena de morte. Eles so Rod e Satie. Um casal de fugitivos que foi enganado por falsas promessas de MacGaren.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Jaspion, Anri e Miya esto na floresta. De repente escutam um canto que vem de uma rvore de cedro. Jaspion conversa com a rvore e descobre que ela ser derrubada. Macgaren sugere a seu pai Satan Goss que transforme a rvore em um monstro.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.sub-title: A histria de uma certa rvore

programme.title: Crianas de uma vila local encontram um filhote de monstro. MacGaren e sua quadrilha, disfarados, levam o monstrinho. Jaspion ajuda as crianas a recuperarem o filhote, mas MacGaren contra ataca.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Quatro cientistas esto no caminho da cidade tecnolgica de Tsukuba em uma lancha pelo rio. Quando voltam esto com os cabelos brancos, alm disso comeam a agir violentamente.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A profecia da Bblia Galctica cita a existncia de um emprstimo passado dourado que ajudou um heri a derrotar Satan Goss. Macgaren escraviza o povo de uma aldeia em busca do pssaro.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Chegando da Galxia, os renegados espaciais "Quadridemos" com um nico objetivo: destruir Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: O Professor Nanbara captura em uma foto a imagem do emprstimo passo dourado. Jaspion investiga o que aconteceu, mas Macgaren e Iki esto espera.

programme.sub-title: Sonho ou iluso? A imagem dourada

programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Todos acham que Cartman est muito gordo e decidem envi-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny est topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva s mais diversas insanidades.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais no deixam. Cartman sugere que ele v polcia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes esto tristes pois o senhor Hanckey anda bastante ocupado com sua famlia e no consegue compartilhar seu esprito natalino pela cidade. Ento eles tem uma ideia para reviver o esprito natalino na cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Scott Tenorman um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele far o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participao especial: Radiohead.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes conhecem um novo rapaz deficiente chamado Jimmy no clube de exploradores, e Timmy fica com cimes. Por outro lado, os pais no conseguem acreditar que Gay Al seja o lder destes pequenos exploradores.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes conseguem entradas para ir assistir ao show de Terrance e Philip ao vivo, mas o programa cai no mesmo dia que o festival da "Lavagem Cerebral" pelo Dia da Terra.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Terrance e Philip: por trs do golpe

programme.title: Cartman recebe como herana de sua av um milho de dlares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diverso somente para ele, no qual ele no precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, j que ningum mais pode entrar.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um dos rapazes mais velhos ensinam para o Cartman como masturbar um cachorro. Quando os pais dos garotos descobrem isso, a escola se v obrigada a ensinar educao sexual para os estudantes em uma idade mais jovem.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Para conseguir recuperar um videogame, os rapazes devem entregar uma toalha falante e entreg-la ao servio secreto americano.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cada estudante de South Park deve doar um dlar para ajudar os meninos do Afeganisto. Mas quando Stan recebe uma caixa misteriosa por parte dos meninos afeganos, todas as agncias do governo aparecem na cidade para investigar.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Osama Bin Laden tem calas fedorentas

programme.title: No dia da foto da escola, Kenny, fazendo graa, entra no seu moletom de cabea pra baixo, deixando no lugar de sua cabea, sua bunda. Cartman acha to engraado que decide espalhar a foto nas caixas de leite da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Como comer com a sua bunda

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que tambm se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua me em South Park. Porm, apesar da mesma idade, os primos no tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Token est triste pois os demais meninos da escola tiram sarro que sua famlia rica e no tem nada a ver com South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman encontra um carregamento cheio de fetos abortados aps o tombamento de um caminho em um barranco. Em seguida, ele decide entrar para um novo negcio supostamente lucrativo: a venda de fetos mortos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: um episdio de South Park especial dedicado ao Butters para encerrar a temporada. A me de Butters descobre que seu esposo est visitando lugares gays e ento, quer se suicidar e matar o Butters.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: J que Butters parece encaixar to bem com Cartman, Kyle e Stan, seus pais decidem ir com eles para passar um final de semana em Aspen. Ao chegar em Aspen, Stan, que no nada experiente, se v forado a competir contra um campeo de ski.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes fazem qualquer coisa para no perder a estreia do novo filme de Terrance e Phillip "Bundas de fogo 2".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: O trailer do novo filme de Terrance e Phillip

programme.title: A turma visita uma granja onde os meninos ficam sabendo que "vitela" uma vaquinha beb e ficam horrorizados. Eles decidem libertar estas criaturinhas e encontrar uma maneira de levar todas elas para o quarto de Stan.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman, Kyle e Stan dizem para Butters que ele um pouco chato e que no h chances de que ele seja o substituto de Kenny. Assim, eles resolver abrir um concurso para encontrar candidatos que possam ficar no seu lugar.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se entusiasma com umas criaturas marinhas que pode criar em seu prprio quarto. Enquanto isso, Butters, sob a forma de seu alter-ego, o Professor Caos, volta com vrios novos e malvados planos para instalar o caos em South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Um caso de abusos sexuais envolvendo sacerdotes o mais novo escndalo para os habitantes de South Park. Enquanto isso, Cartman tenta descobrir que tipo de coisas so capazes de sair de sua boca.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes querem armar um clube para evitar que os diretores reestreiem seus filmes em verses "melhoradas", e Cartman acha que seria uma boa ideia oferecer chapus grtis para promover o clube.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperana, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Anglica uma adolescente de 16 anos que luta contra uma forma rara de cncer. E, enquanto seus pais batalham para custear seu tratamento e ganhar mais tempo de vida para a garota, ela se apaixona pela primeira vez.

programme.title: A Histria de Wim de A a Z, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Conhea a histria do rfo Wim, um menino que quer muito ir escola em vez de passar o tempo todo trabalhando foradamente na fbrica da cidade. Com muita fora de vontade, Wim consegue escapar e encontrar novos amigos.

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra.

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Big Stone Gap o lar de personagens charmosos e excntricos. Ave Maria Mulligan, uma farmacutica de 35 anos, a solteirona da cidade. A vida de Ave vira de cabea para baixo depois que ela descobre um segredo de famlia.

programme.title: Deus No Est Morto - Uma Luz na Escurido, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um incndio atinge a Igreja de Saint James, devastando a congregao e o Pastor Dave, e a universidade vizinha usa a tragdia para tentar despejar a congregao de seu campus. Dave recorre a seu irmo, um advogado ateu, para tentar reerguer a igreja.

programme.title: Roubo a Mfia, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Tommy e Rosie so um casal apaixonado, mas que acabam presos ao serem flagrados roubando. Aps esse deslize, eles tentam ganhar a vida honestamente, mas logo ele se v envolvido no julgamento de um famoso assassino da mfia.

programme.title: Um Homem Comum, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um criminoso de guerra procurado mundo afora conhece uma empregada e um estranho relacionamento surge entre eles. Quando a calmaria parece estabelecida na vida dele, ela descobre que h uma recompensa milionria para quem souber onde o fugitivo est.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais se tornam vtimas de uma gangue. Os policiais so brutalmente assassinados e um jovem designado para ajud-lo, mas a gangue volta a agir, iniciando uma aventura cheia de ao e vingana.

programme.title: A Outra Face da Guerra, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps perder a me e a casa para as tropas invasoras alems, Artur encontra certo consolo em se juntar ao exrcito. No entanto, a guerra no nada como ele imaginou.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Nossas Vidas, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um criminoso insensvel e doente cruza o caminho de uma menina cheia de f. Agora, pare ele, nasce uma segunda chance para aquecer o corao durante a temporada de festas de final de ano.

programme.title: S falta um minuto de duelo, at que o perdedor seja enviado para afundar nas profundezas do mar! Ser que estes grandes amigos levaro um ao outro perdio? Pode ser que haja uma salvadora especial, que acabou de recuperar a viso...
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Bakura aciona a Tbua do Destino, que far Yugi perder automaticamente em cinco turnos! Como se isso j no fosse ruim, o Santurio das Trevas de Bakura afeta os pontos de vida de Yugi a cada ataque! Incapaz de atacar e ficando sem tempo, Yugi est preso!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada

programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido

programme.desc: Sarada duvida que Sakura seja sua me biolgica, e se junta a Cho-Cho, que est prestes a sair em uma jornada em busca dos seus "pais verdadeiros".

programme.title: Blue Chips, (1994, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Pete Bell, a college basketball coach is under a lot of pressure. His team isn't winning. The stars of the future are being paid by other teams. This practise is forbidden in the college game, but Pete is desperate and has pressures from all around.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The second duel of the Fortune Cup is about to get under way as the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose finds herself having to face off against a medieval menace named Sir Randsborg.

programme.desc: As the battle between the Professor and Luna continues, Luna looks to keep a promise she made to protect the Duel Monsters Spirit World, but in order for her to succeed, she must first break free of the hypnotic hold the Professor has on her.

programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale one win away, Yusei and Akiza get set to battle it out as Director Goodwin anxiously awaits the final Signer to reveal their Mark of the Dragon.

programme.desc: As the back-and-forth battle between Akiza and Yusei rages on, Yusei is forced to unleash his mighty Stardust Dragon in order to stop Akiza's grisly garden from squeezing his life points into submission.

programme.desc: Yusei and Crow set off to confront the Dark Signers in an effort to stop them from destroying the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In an effort to save the Satellite Sector from being destroyed, Yusei agrees to face off against a former friend turned Dark Signer in a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei confronts his former friend Kalin about their past in an effort to stop him from awakening the Army of Shadows.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The safety of the world hangs in the balance as Yusei tries to figure out a way to outduel and outmaneuver the unstoppable power of Kalin's dark deck.

programme.desc: Luna and her new found friend Torunka hatch a plan to free Regulus from King Zeman's minus curse. Meanwhile, back in the Satellite Sector, Leo calls upon his Power Tool Dragon to help him dismantle Devack's dark deck.

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.title: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!

programme.title: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chin Jao!

programme.title: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.title: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!

programme.title: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami & the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, & the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!

programme.title: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Law & Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation Zoro finally gets to see Luffy but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebecca's Special Attack! Last-Ditch Sword Dance!

programme.title: Bartolomeo searches the Colosseum for Luffy but stumbles upon the medical center for the losers of the battles in the ring, but is everything at this center as it seems? Meanwhile, Rebecca has to fend off Rolling Logan's vicious bone-crushing grip attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Most Violent Fighter! Logan vs. Rebecca!

programme.title: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Surprise! The True Identity of the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!

programme.title: As the toy soldier's story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!

programme.title: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law as these two powerhouses clash.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit as a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!

programme.title: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family, Operation SOP. Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace's Will!

programme.title: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!

programme.title: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! All hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!

programme.title: The battle for Block D comes to a shocking end and the winner that emerges from the cloud of dust stuns the audience even more! Meanwhile, Luffy, Zoro, Kin'emon, and Wicka of the Tontatta Tribe are about to reach the lift to the palace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Match?! A Surprising Result of Block D!

programme.title: Viola, aka Violet, once a great princess of the Dressrosa family, shows Luffy & the others a secret entrance into the palace which avoids the use of the heavily-guarded lift. In the palace's Suit Chamber, Navy Admiral Fujitora reveals his plans.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Admiral's Decision! Fujitora vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: The final round at the Corrida Colosseum finally begins, as Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the Flare-Flare Fruit! As the stakes escalate, can one champion beat the others & snatch the fruit from the Colosseum's newest hazard?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Final Round Starts! Diamante the Hero Shows Up!

programme.title: Luffy and his group continue their ascent towards Doflamingo's inner sanctum, but standing in their way is an executive of the family whose power is so strong moving past him seems impossible! Meanwhile, Cavendish learns the dark secrets of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises Up!

programme.title: As Operation SOP finally gets underway but as Leo makes the dash to hide the Tatabasco grape in Sugar's fruit basket, Robin calls for an emergency stop to the plan! Meanwhile, Luffy, Violet, and Zoro are stalled by Pica whose sheer size overwhelms them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dragon Claw Strikes! Lucy's Intimidating Attack!

programme.title: Operation SOP is underway and nearing its final stage! But Trebol proves a far stronger guard for Sugar than was expected, so Robin hatches a plan to lure him away. But is there enough time to execute the plan before the ruse is discovered?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat Sugar! The Army of the Little People Charges!

programme.title: The Tontattas are devastated by Trebol's furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander Toy Soldier's stunning true identity! The Toy Soldier finally shakes off Lao G and gets moving again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last Light of Hope! The Secret of Our Commander!

programme.title: Zoro continues his deadly duel with the nearly indestructible Pica! While the Toy Soldier narrowly escapes Lao G only to come face to face with Gladius! Luffy continues his mad dash to the top of the palace to face Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rupture Human! Gladius Blows Up Big Time!

programme.title: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! But will he be able to muster the confidence and courage to face the terrible Trebol?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Liar! Usoland on the Run!

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Public Cowboy No. 1, (1937, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry's crime fighting is tested when rustlers employ modern techniques. The newspaper's scathing editorials bash Gene's methods and demand to call in big city detectives. Old methods are tested.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: Cariboo Trail, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canada's British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: Gunslinger, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: When the town marshal is gunned down, his wife Rose (Beverly Garland) dons his badge. But now an evil dancehall diva (Allison Hayes) wants her dead and hires a gunslinger (John Ireland), who agrees to kill Rose...until he falls in love with her!

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land barron and his hired gun.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage - T01E24
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte - T01E25
programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem! - T01E26
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel - T01E27
programme.desc: 2007. Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas! - T01E28
programme.desc: 2007. Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado - T01E29
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento - T01E30
programme.desc: 2007. Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado - T01E31
programme.desc: 2007. Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage - T01E32
programme.desc: 2007. As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo - T01E33
programme.desc: 2007. Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi - T01E34
programme.desc: 2007. Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada - T01E35
programme.desc: 2007. Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso - T01E36
programme.desc: 2007. Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo - T01E37
programme.desc: 2007. Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao - T01E38
programme.desc: 2007. Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi - T01E39
programme.desc: 2007. Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta - T01E40
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia - T01E41
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: 2007. Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki - T01E42
programme.desc: 2008. A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten. programme.title: Congo (1995)
programme.desc: Killer gorillas menace an ex-CIA agent (Laura Linney), a primatologist (Dylan Walsh) and others on a mission in Africa.

programme.title: Scream 2 (1997)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: The Saint (1997)
programme.desc: A clever thief who is known as the master of creating false identities using the names of Catholic saints, is hired by the Russian Mafia for his next mission. But things get complicated when he falls for Emma Russel, the scientist.

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin (2005)
programme.desc: When his world spirals out of control, a drug dealer wants to leave his violent life behind and pursue his dream of becoming a rap artist. He channels the same manic intensity to his writing as he does to dealing.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: McEnroe (2022)
programme.desc: John McEnroe finally tells his side of his storied career and performances on the court.

programme.title: Face/Off (1997)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Mourning in Lod (2023)
programme.desc: The fates of three families become inextricably intertwined when a Palestinian citizen is killed by a Jewish settler in the city of Lod, Israel, and deadly riots break out.

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: The Outlaws (2024)
programme.desc: A group of outlaws awaken to their empty train heist bag. Interrogations begin as each cowboy becomes the focus in an attempt to unmask the thief among them. Tensions mount as each bandit struggles to clear their name before bullets fly.

programme.title: The Beldham (2024)
programme.desc: A struggling new mother fights a generations-old presence lurking within her familys home, threatening her safety, her sanity, and the life of her infant child.

programme.title: The Haunting (1999)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Changeland (2019)
programme.desc: A man meets up with his best friend in Thailand while going through a personal crisis.

programme.title: Face/Off (1997)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Love, Sex and Robots (2024)
programme.desc: Wild women get it on.

programme.title: The Original Kings of Comedy (2000)
programme.desc: Spike Lee directed this document of an evening of stand-up comedy performed by four prominent black entertainers.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa (2013)
programme.desc: Irving Zisman (Johnny Knoxville) takes his young and impressionable grandson (Jackson Nicoll) on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact (1996)
programme.desc: Picard (Patrick Stewart), Riker (Jonathan Frakes) and the others set off to stop the half-robot Borg from sabotaging the first warp drive flight in 2063.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Wander (2020)
programme.desc: Hired to investigate a suspicious death in the town of Wander, a paranoid private eye with a troubled past becomes convinced the case is linked to the same conspiracy and cover-up that caused the death of his daughter.

programme.title: Pixie (2020)
programme.desc: Pixie sets out to avenge her mothers death and attempts a heist that will give her the means to leave her small-town life behind. When the plan goes horribly wrong, shes forced to team up with a pair of misfits who are clearly in over their heads.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
programme.desc: After shooting the man who murdered his wife, a Danish settler (Mads Mikkelsen) incurs the wrath of the mans brother (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a ruthless land baron who rules their frontier town.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: Anything Else (2003)
programme.desc: A writer (Jason Biggs) has problems with his live-in girlfriend (Christina Ricci) and an obsessive teacher (Woody Allen) with a history of mental illness.

programme.title: Jane Eyre (1996)
programme.desc: Charlotte Bronts gothic heroine loves her moody employer, who keeps a dark secret hidden from her.

programme.title: Becoming Jane (2007)
programme.desc: Though her parents expect her to marry a wealthy suitor, young Jane Austen (Anne Hathaway) becomes involved with a penniless lawyer (James McAvoy) who inspires her future writings.

programme.title: Match Point (2005)
programme.desc: A one-time tennis professional (Jonathan Rhys-Meyers) becomes obsessed with his brother-in-laws (Matthew Goode) seductive fiancee (Scarlett Johansson).

programme.title: The To Do List (2013)
programme.desc: Determined to shed her uptight image, a high-school valedictorian (Aubrey Plaza) decides to lose her virginity before college begins. Realizing that she is out of her depth, she asks friends and family for advice.

programme.title: Alfie (2004)
programme.desc: A Londoner (Jude Law) continues his womanizing ways while working as a chauffeur in New York.

programme.title: Nobodys Fool (2018)
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danicas picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Marvelous and the Black Hole (2021)
programme.desc: A rebellious 13-year-old who is dealing with the loss of her mother embarks on an adventure with a childrens party magician.

programme.title: Blue Eyed Girl (2025)
programme.desc: Summoned home to visit her two sisters and her ailing father, a woman starts to re-evaluate her life as she wonders what could have been.

programme.title: The Silent Planet (2024)
programme.desc: Serving a life sentence alone on a distant planet, an aging convict must confront his past when a new prisoner arrives and forces him to remember his life on Earth.

programme.title: Seaside (2018)
programme.desc: A woman decides to run away to the Oregon coast with her boyfriend when he inherits a family beach house.

programme.title: About Adam (2000)
programme.desc: A magnetic young man (Stuart Townsend) meets and romances an Irish waitress (Kate Hudson), then courts and beds the rest of the family.

programme.title: Shes Out of My League (2010)
programme.desc: An airport security agent must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman falls in love with him.

programme.title: Jennys Wedding (2015)
programme.desc: When Jenny (Katherine Heigl) decides to marry a woman (Alexis Bledel), her conventional family must accept who she is or risk losing her forever.

programme.title: Boys and Girls (2000)
programme.desc: Two longtime friends (Freddie Prinze Jr., Claire Forlani), each with a string of failed romances, wonder if they should date each other.

programme.title: Down to You (2000)
programme.desc: Two collegians (Freddie Prinze Jr., Julia Stiles) fall in love but have a bumpy affair due to mischievous roommates and the temptation to stray.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
programme.desc: Benjamin Button (Brad Pitt) is born an old man in 1918 New Orleans and ages in reverse and, in so doing, becomes intimately familiar with the natures of love and death.

programme.title: Forces of Nature (1999)
programme.desc: A bridegroom (Ben Affleck) hurries by plane to his wedding, but he and his seatmate (Sandra Bullock) must find other modes of travel.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here (2020)
programme.desc: A successful author finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students after being asked to speak at her alma mater.

programme.title: Pretty Red Dress (2022)
programme.desc: The story of Travis, Candice and their daughter, Kenisha, and their relationships with the same red dress.

programme.title: Marvins Room (1996)
programme.desc: A Florida leukemia patient (Diane Keaton) needs her sisters (Meryl Streep) bone marrow, but first they must end a 20-year feud.

programme.title: The Hours (2002)
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Queen Bees (2021)
programme.desc: While her house undergoes repairs, fiercely independent senior Helen temporarily moves into a nearby retirement community, where she encounters lusty widows, cutthroat bridge tournaments and a hotbed of bullying "mean girls."

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh welder works days, dances in a bar at night, dates her boss and chases the dream of acceptance into a prestigious ballet school.

programme.title: Mothers Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mothers Day draws near, a single mom (Jennifer Aniston) learns that her ex-husband (Timothy Olyphant) is marrying a younger woman (Shay Mitchell), while a recently widowed man (Jason Sudeikis) struggles to raise his two daughters.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Shes the Man (2006)
programme.desc: Romantic complications ensue when a student poses as her twin brother and replaces him at his boarding school.

programme.title: Grease 2 (1982)
programme.desc: A square British exchange student (Maxwell Caulfield) turns hip motorcyclist to woo a cool girl (Michelle Pfeiffer) in his 1961 high school.

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh welder works days, dances in a bar at night, dates her boss and chases the dream of acceptance into a prestigious ballet school.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love (1998)
programme.desc: Young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes) falls for Viola (Gwyneth Paltrow), reawakening his creativity, but she is betrothed to Wessex.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Mothers Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mothers Day draws near, a single mom (Jennifer Aniston) learns that her ex-husband (Timothy Olyphant) is marrying a younger woman (Shay Mitchell), while a recently widowed man (Jason Sudeikis) struggles to raise his two daughters.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard at Guantnamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: Regarding Us (2025)
programme.desc: After losing her teaching career, A transgender woman has a profound impact on the lives of two children.

programme.title: The Argument (2020)
programme.desc: When a couple argue about a party and neither will back down, they decide to re-create the evening to determine who is right.

programme.title: Kate and Leopold (2001)
programme.desc: A Manhattan woman (Meg Ryan) falls in love with the 19th-century Duke of Albany (Hugh Jackman) who has stepped through a time portal.

programme.title: The Prince and Me (2004)
programme.desc: Paige, a premedical student, falls in love with Eddie, a Danish prince, who keeps his identity a secret.

programme.title: Runaway Bride (1999)
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Richard Gere) travels to Maryland to profile a woman (Julia Roberts) who left three bridegrooms at the altar.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby (2016)
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall (2024)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.
